patient

Class PatientFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • patient.PatientFileManager

  • public class PatientFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to manage and interact with patient files.

      • containsFileOf

        public boolean containsFileOf(PatientFile patientFile)
        This method checks if the patientfile of a certain patient exists.
        Parameters:
        patientFile - the patientfile to check for existence.
        Returns:
        True if the file exists in this patient file manager.

      • getPatientFilesAsString

      • getPatientFileFrom

        public PatientFile getPatientFileFrom(java.lang.String name)
                               throws InvalidNameException
        This method will fetch the patientfile from a certain patient.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the patient.
        Returns:
        The patientfile of the requested patient or null if no such patient is found.
        Throws:
        InvalidNameException
